casebody.data:
CHARLES F. EATON and E. MELBA EATON, as husband and wife, MARGARET S. FRICK, joined by her husband, O. T. FRICK, THOMAS W. AUSTIN and RUTH V. AUSTIN, as husband and wife, v. CITY OF FORT LAUDERDALE, a municipal corporation of Florida. 31 So. (2nd) 64

June Term, 1947

June 17, 1947 Special Division A Rehearing Denied July 7, 1947 T. D. Ellis, Jr., for appellant. Julian E. Ross, for appellee. *100PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on authority of City of Hollywood v. Davis, et al., 154 Fla. 785, 19 So. (2nd) 111.

THOMAS, C. J., TERRELL and CHAPMAN, JJ., and WILLIAMS, Associate Justice, concur.
